human: What's the primary focus of this slide?

gpt: The primary focus of this slide is on leveraging mobile technology to expand the reach of insurance, particularly addressing the challenge of underinsurance in certain populations. The text and diagrams also delve into the various ways in which technology-enabled solutions can improve insurance provision, including distribution channels and the role of tech-focused insurance companies in facilitating this transformation. The slide further explores the concept of "InsurTech" (a portmanteau of "insurance" and "technology") and provides examples of companies in this space, emphasizing the importance of distribution and delivery systems in the insurance industry.
